Name: Basic Sword
Description: A classic melee weapon, used to slash and stab enemies.

Name: Basic Bow
Description: A ranged weapon that uses arrows to deal Damage to enemies from a distance.

Name: Basic Dagger
Description: A small, agile weapon that can be used for quick attacks or stealthy assassinations.

Name: Basic Axe
Description: A heavy, two-handed weapon that deals crushing blows to enemies.

Name: Basic Mace
Description: A blunt weapon that can be used to crush armor and bones.

Name: Basic Staff
Description: A versatile weapon that can be used for melee attacks or to cast spells.

Name: Basic Spear
Description: A long, pointed weapon that can be used for thrusting attacks or to keep enemies at a distance.

Name: Basic Wand
Description: A magical weapon that can be used to cast spells or empower allies.

Name: Basic Hammer
Description: A heavy weapon that deals crushing blows to enemies and can also be used to smash obstacles.

Name: Basic Whip
Description: A flexible weapon that can be used to trip or disarm enemies, or to reach items that are out of reach.
